org.apache.mesos.scheduler.recovery

Class DefaultRecoveryPlanManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mesos.scheduler.DefaultObservable
      • org.apache.mesos.scheduler.ChainedObserver
        • org.apache.mesos.scheduler.recovery.DefaultRecoveryPlanManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable, Observer, PlanManager

    public class DefaultRecoveryPlanManager
extends ChainedObserver
implements PlanManager
    DefaultRecoveryPlanManager enables monitoring and management of recovery plan. This is an implementation of PlanManager that performs task recovery using dynamically generated Plan. DefaultRecoveryPlanManager tracks currently failed (permanent) and stopped (transient) tasks, generates a new DefaultRecoveryBlock for them and adds them to the recovery Plan, if not already added.

      • getCandidates

        public java.util.Collection<? extends Block> getCandidates(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> dirtyAssets)
        Description copied from interface: PlanManager
        Determines the next block that should be considered for scheduling. Blocks that are being selected by other PlanManager are provided as dirtiedAssets as a hint to this PlanManager to assist with scheduling.
        Specified by:
        getCandidates in interface PlanManager
        Parameters:
        dirtyAssets - Other blocks/assets that are already selected for scheduling.
        Returns:
        An Optional Block that can be scheduled or an empty Optional when there is no block to schedule. For ex: the chosen block to schedule is being worked on by other PlanManager(s), etc.

      • update

        public void update(Protos.TaskStatus status)
        Updates the recovery plan if necessary. 1. Updates existing blocks. 2. If the needs recovery and doesn't yet have a block in the plan, removes any COMPLETED blocks for this task (at most one block for a given task can exist) and creates a new PENDING block.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer
        Specified by:
        update in interface PlanManager
        Overrides:
        update in class ChainedObserver
        Parameters:
        status - task status
